Body:
"""Test the get_xsteps function"""
assert plot.get_xsteps(size=size, min_x=min_x, plot_cores=plot_cores,
    xtick_step=xtick_step) == xsteps
pytest.mark.parametrize('size,min_x,plot_cores,xtick_step,xsteps', [[10, 1,
    False, None, 1], [18, 1, False, None, 2], [10, 1, True, None, 1], [11, 
    1, True, None, 3], [5, 100, True, None, 3], [5, 1, False, 5, 5]])
